price: Pas du tout, mais ce qu’ils ont accompli couvre leurs cœurs [1043].
arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
footnotes: [1043] Couvre leur cœur: les péchés commis les feront éloigner de leur Seigneur.

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kallā bal rāna ʿalā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūna
